description.value: 15 feet. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the emanation must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|name:Befouling Odor] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune to befouling odor for 1 minute.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
